channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Nick Cave & Bryce Dessner Contribute Original Song To New Film Train Dreams
item.description: 🚂🌟 Nick Cave & Bryce Dessner team up for a musical adventure in the enchanting world of Train Dreams! 🎶 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Jessica Simpson Announces One-Night-Only Las Vegas Show
item.description: ✨ Vegas, baby! 🎤 Jessica Simpson is lighting up the stage for one unforgettable night! Who's ready to sing along? 🔥 #JessicaSimpson #LasVegasShow

item.title: Pentatonix Announce 2025 Holiday Tour: How to Get Tickets
item.description: 🎄✨ Spread the holiday cheer with Pentatonix on tour in 2025! Join the fun and get your tickets now! 🎶🎉 #Pentatonix #HolidayTour2025

item.title: Goose Surprise-Release New Album Chain Yer Dragon: Stream
item.description: 🎶 Get ready to rock out with @GooseBand's surprise album drop! 🤘🔥 Dive into 'Chain Yer Dragon' now! 🎸 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Margaret Glaspy & Norah Jones Share Cover Of Wilco’s “Jesus, Etc.”
item.description: 🎶 Margaret Glaspy & Norah Jones team up for a dreamy cover of Wilco's "Jesus, Etc." 🌟✨ #MusicCollabGoals
